title: Baked Chicken Burgers with Mushrooms and Spinach

Ingredients.7: 2 teaspoons chicken soup base (such as Better than Bouillon® Roasted Chicken Base)

Ingredients.8: 1 salt and ground black pepper to taste

Directions.1: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Lightly grease a 9x13-inch baking pan with 1/2 of the avocado oil.

Directions.2: Combine mushrooms, spinach, onion, and garlic in the bowl of a small food processor or blender and pulse several times until chopped into very small pieces, but not pureed.

Directions.3: Place ground chicken in a bowl. Add chopped vegetables, chicken base, salt, and pepper. Mix until vegetable pieces are evenly distributed. Divide mixture into 5 evenly sized portions and shape into patties.

Directions.4: Place patties onto the prepared baking sheet and lightly brush with remaining avocado oil.

Directions.5: Bake in the preheated oven for about 20 minutes. Turn on the broiler and broil each side until browned, 1 to 2 minutes per side. An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C).

Directions.6: Place each chicken burger on a bun.
